recent_posts.title: Your First Blog Post Title
recent_posts.excerpt: This is a brief excerpt or summary of your blog post content. It should be concise and engaging to encourage readers to click through.

recent_posts.title: Another Great Blog Post
recent_posts.excerpt: Another engaging excerpt that describes what readers will find in this post. Keep it short and compelling.

recent_posts.title: Third Blog Post Example
recent_posts.excerpt: This excerpt shows how the recent posts section displays multiple blog entries in a grid layout.
